review.title: “A Tech. Company with Significant Issues”
review.pros: Pros – -As a relatively new company 3D-P may have opportunities to move up quicker in some periods than in others-New employees are very friendly-Manufacturing staff is very friendly
review.cons: Cons – -Few in organization know the corporate mission, goals, and objectives-Very haphazardly put together-Promotes gender roles - women in marketing, HR, etc.-Management is different depending on your boss-Very high turnover in certain departments-Can have unrealistic expectations-They will make you work extra long hours if you are on salary-Work appears to be rushed-A lot of pressure to work overtime and to reach unrealistic goals
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – -Develop a shared mission-Request input from your employees-Study the job you are hiring for and prepare realistic expectations-Hire an appropriate amount of staff-provide incentives to work overtime, they don't have to be monetary
